info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:46PM CDT until June 06 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND AND NORTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colona, or near East Moline, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. Trained spotters reported quarter sized hail at 440 PM in Coal Valley. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Cleveland and Dayton around 450 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Osborn, Morristown, Osco, Shady Beach and Geneseo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
